document.full_text: europe is renewing its push for the united states to ease restrictions on foreign ownership of airlines, arguing that access to a steady stream of capital remains a top industry concern.
document.title: ec vp says u.s. airline ownership talks productive
lines_and_colors: europe is renewing its push for the united states to ease restrictions on foreign ownership of airlines, arguing that access to a steady stream of capital remains a top industry concern.
